message.content:
I need to identify and extract the value of costs related to general management and administration of the entity from the income statement.

Looking at the income statement provided, I can see various expense categories. The line item that specifically relates to general management and administration costs would be "Administrative Expenses" with a value of 1529708.19.

This item represents the costs associated with the general management and administration of the entity as a whole, which is what I'm looking for in this task.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '1529708.19'} }
```
